source: Reward for inviting Barbara to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1201], equip this card.
After $[A1201] equips this card, immediately use $[S12012] once.
When your $[A1201], who has this card equipped, is on the field, Melody Loop will allow you to spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character." (Once per round)
(You must have $[A1201] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
